On Sun, 2002-10-13 at 00:05, Levi Cook wrote:

> Import your source files; delete the classes that you're not interested in
> seeing; then hit print. Grab the tape dispenser and head for the printer..
> :)

One place I was working had a big colour plotter.  That made very nice
diagram printouts for the wall.
 
> The "Type-Hierarchy" view in Eclipse (&WSAD) can also be very useful to get
> a quick idea of what relationships exist.

But that only shows inheritance & implementation hierarchies, which
should be fairly small anyway.  Very little information compared to a
good class diagram.

Dave
